Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
Main game controller that coordinates between the game logic (Board) and the user interface (GuiController). Handles user input events and manages game state transitions.
Since:
1.0
See Also:
  • Board
  • GuiController
  • InputEventListener
